titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Pell. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S.RES. 71 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 1/28/1993--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations for the 103d Congress.
